title: What goes around, Feeds the Ground.: book one, the Farm.
description: Collin is angry and frustrated with his life. He's working on changing it. An unforeseen appointment thrusts him towards new frontiers in ways that he never could have dreamed of. The Farm is the first installment in his journey into a world of beings that are only meant to exist in the corner of your eye. It's the story of a man coming into his own, finding himself, and fighting a losing battle for control over his future. Bad people, good monsters, and an eternity to fuel the grudge, is what awaits you and Collin in - What goes around, Feeds the Ground.
author: Paul J. Labonte
